description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Course fully up-to-date and new lectures added as of this month.

JOIN 1,000s OF CURRENT AND ASPIRING INSTRUCTORS WHO ARE CREATING AMAZING, MARKETABLE, AND PROFITABLE COURSES IN JUST 21 DAYS!

1. Would you like to monetize your expertise or passion from the comfort of your home?

2. Are you tired of the many unoriginal “how to make money on Udemy" courses that won't get you past the $10,000 revenue hump?

3. Are you interested in implementing the strategies and tactics that the bestsellers use to make thousands every month?

If you answered "yes" to at least one of these questions, then this course is for you!

Udemy is the world's online learning marketplace, where millions of students are taking courses on just about everything. They provide a platform for people like you and I to make money online by creating and selling prerecorded courses. Many instructors are making thousands with bestsellers making hundreds of thousands more. Udemy offers an investment-free opportunity to grow your business and expand your personal brand. You don't need an email list or large network to get started. They provide the traffic for you!

Udemy Launch is the only comprehensive data-driven course on achieving success on Udemy. Over 400 bestselling courses were analyzed to provide you with valuable insights and best practices. In essence, you will learn from hundreds of profitable instructors, not just one or two (who may have got lucky). This course is designed to ensure you succeed from day one of launching your Udemy course. This is the course I wish I took, when I first started.

As you navigate this course, you'll gain insights and learn the strategies that I use to make thousands. Upon successful completion of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Understand why some instructors succeed while others don't
  • Choose a winning topic that attracts students and customers
  • Develop a highly marketable, profitable, and amazing course
  • Target key factors to improve your SEO and search rankings
  • Make professional and dynamic PowerPoint instructional videos
  • Deploy proven and practical launch strategies
  • Understand the concept of social proof, where and how to get students and reviews
  • Increase your sales and keep the momentum going
  • And much more


Sign up and experience the most comprehensive Udemy development course found on the web.

Start Learning!

Enroll now and start monetizing your expertise TODAY!
title: Udemy Launch: Become a Bestselling Instructor - Unofficial
instructors: Chad Tennant, Make Money Online - Home Business
